11.eng-name: The Rites of Hajj (Kitab Al-Manasik Wa'l-Hajj)

hadiths.text: Narrated Ali ibn AbuTalib: When the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) sacrificed the camels, he sacrificed thirty of them with his own hand, and then commanded me (to sacrifice them), so I sacrificed the rest of them

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الْهَدْىِ إِذَا عَطِبَ قَبْلَ أَنْ يَبْلُغَ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding The Sacrificial Animal Being Unable To Continue Traveling Before Reaching Makkah
